PHANPY_CLIENT_NAME.description: Client name that affects web page title, app title, OpenGraph card title, and client name for authentication

PHANPY_WEBSITE.description: Canonical URL of the website, affects OpenGraph card URL and client URL for authentication

PHANPY_DEFAULT_INSTANCE.description: Default instance for log-in (e.g. 'mastodon.social', without https://)

PHANPY_DEFAULT_INSTANCE_REGISTRATION_URL.description: URL of the instance registration page (e.g. https://mastodon.social/auth/sign_up)

PHANPY_PRIVACY_POLICY_URL.description: URL of the privacy policy page

PHANPY_DEFAULT_LANG.description: Default language fallback after multiple detection methods

PHANPY_REFERRER_POLICY.description: Referrer policy for the site, applied with meta tag on client-side

PHANPY_LINGVA_INSTANCES.description: DEPRECATED: Space-separated list of Lingva instances for translation

PHANPY_TRANSLANG_INSTANCES.description: Space-separated list of Translang instances for translation

PHANPY_IMG_ALT_API_URL.description: API endpoint for self-hosted img-alt-api instance

PHANPY_DISALLOW_ROBOTS.description: Set to any value to disallow all web crawlers from indexing the site
